```{r}
library(sparklyr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
sc <- spark_connect(master = "local")
copy_to(sc, iris, "iris")


iris <- tbl(sc, "iris")
ml_knn(iris, 10, response = "Species", features = c("Sepal_Length", "Sepal_Width", "Petal_Length", "Petal_Width"))
```
